/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and white, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, with their lush green leaves, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, the calm waters of a lake can be seen, reflecting the sky and adding a sense of tranquility to the scene.
